com.inmobi.monetization

Interface IMInterstitialListener


  • public interface IMInterstitialListener
    The listener interface for receiving notifications from IMInterstitial about the status of the interstitial ad.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDismissInterstitialScreen(IMInterstitial interstitial)
      Called from IMInterstitial when an interstitial ad gets closed.
      void onInterstitialFailed(IMInterstitial interstitial, IMErrorCode errorCode)
      Called from IMInterstitial when it failed to load an ad.
      void onInterstitialInteraction(IMInterstitial banner, Map<String,String> params)
      Called when the interstitial is tapped or interacted with by the user Optional data is available to publishers to act on when using monetization platform to render promotional ads
      void onInterstitialLoaded(IMInterstitial interstitial)
      Called from IMInterstitial when it successfully loads an ad.
      void onLeaveApplication(IMInterstitial interstitial)
      Called from IMInterstitial when any action in the interstitial ad leaves the application context.
      void onShowInterstitialScreen(IMInterstitial interstitial)
      Called from IMInterstitial when an interstitial ad is shown on top of the screen.

    • Method Detail

      • onInterstitialFailed

        void onInterstitialFailed(IMInterstitial interstitial,
                        IMErrorCode errorCode)
        Called from IMInterstitial when it failed to load an ad.
        Parameters:
        interstitial -
        errorCode - errorCode.toString provides more information.

      • onInterstitialLoaded

        void onInterstitialLoaded(IMInterstitial interstitial)
        Called from IMInterstitial when it successfully loads an ad. Ideally, on receiving this notification, the interstitial ad is ready to be shown.
        Parameters:
        interstitial -

      • onShowInterstitialScreen

        void onShowInterstitialScreen(IMInterstitial interstitial)
        Called from IMInterstitial when an interstitial ad is shown on top of the screen. The application has to suspend itself on receiving this notification.
        Parameters:
        interstitial -

      • onDismissInterstitialScreen

        void onDismissInterstitialScreen(IMInterstitial interstitial)
        Called from IMInterstitial when an interstitial ad gets closed. The application has to resume itself on receiving this notification.
        Parameters:
        interstitial -

      • onInterstitialInteraction

        void onInterstitialInteraction(IMInterstitial banner,
                             Map<String,String> params)
        Called when the interstitial is tapped or interacted with by the user Optional data is available to publishers to act on when using monetization platform to render promotional ads
        Parameters:
        banner -
        params -

      • onLeaveApplication

        void onLeaveApplication(IMInterstitial interstitial)
        Called from IMInterstitial when any action in the interstitial ad leaves the application context.
        Parameters:
        interstitial -
